system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.kPaVd4mwK6ZO0hyq]{Tactical Draw (selected weapon)}, Proficient with weapon

Benefits

A character may draw a model of weapon from a holster or sheath and immediately make a single attack for 4 Combat Points. The weapon used must be the same model that the character has a Tactical Draw feat for. This may only be done twice per turn.

Special

Any feats or equipment that reduce the Combat Point cost for a single attack or for drawing a weapon also reduce the Combat Point cost for this attack. The weapon must be in a holster or a sheath.
system.summary: Draw weapon and attack with it in same action.
